title: Did Van Halen like the Beatles? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of these bands from the early to mid 70s started out as cover bands. That being said, if that's what you were doing at that time then you damn well had better have had at least 2 or 3 beatle songs as well as at least 1 Chuck Berry song in your repitoure. I firmly believe that once you started looking at the beatles body of work, you would had to have developed an admiration and affection for their work. Did they like the Beatles? I truely don't know…I am going to go out on limb and say yes they did like the Beatles!!

I believe, as most rock bands from that era, that Van Halen admired the Beatles. Whether or not they were directly influenced by them, I cannot say. But I’m sure some of Eddie’s guitar work was influenced by George Harrison.
I’m sure they did…. All great musicians love the Beatles, they understand them and what they contributed to music.
Given when they started out they played covers and the popularity of the Beatles in America and the catchy nature of their music my instincts say yes .
